solution_line_template: In the morning she runs {morning_runs} * {circuit_length} = <<{morning_runs}*{circuit_length}={morning_distance}>>{morning_distance} metres
In the afternoon she runs {afternoon_runs} * {circuit_length}= <<{afternoon_runs}*{circuit_length}={afternoon_distance}>>{afternoon_distance} meters.
In one day, afternoon and morning, she runs {morning_distance} + {afternoon_distance} = <<{morning_distance}+{afternoon_distance}={daily_distance}>>{daily_distance} meters
In a week, she runs {days_in_week} * {daily_distance}= <<{days_in_week}*{daily_distance}={weekly_distance}>>{weekly_distance} meters
